title: Congratulations Troll, You Got Me Permabanned
body:
I play almost exclusively jungle. Every game I play, I put 100% into making good plays and winning. For me, the fun of the game is playing at a high level and ultimately winning. I can enjoy a loss if it was a close game and well played.

I do have a temper, especially when I get harassed for not playing to my teammate's expectations. Especially when those teammates happen to be playing very badly independently of me.

My account is about 10 years old. I just received a permanent ban within minutes of finishing a game. I was playing with someone who played top and was dying a lot early on and was harassing me to come gank their lane, and saying that the other team's jungle was ganking but I wasn't. Common scenario, right? This particular scenario is infuriating, because I'm already doing everything I can to help out my team. I want to help them. I want to make good plays with them and win. But I can't be everywhere at once. At the time this guy starts harassing me, it's only a few minutes into the game and I haven't had an opportunity to gank top yet. They continued to harass me as I was making plays, trying to help other lanes, and I ultimately flew off the handle. I cursed them out, and I complained in all chat that I was getting harassed by my teammate using very colorful language. The opposing team joined in on the fun and took his side, because why not, when you're stuffing another team, it's fun to add insult to injury. Well, after the game, I got permabanned. The troll won in the end, and I guess I'm never playing league again.

I'm not a saint. I can be baited into reacting. If that means I can't play league, then fine. For the troll, on the other hand, he's winning the game of being inflammatory and getting otherwise innocent players banned.

replies.body: TBH, should have just muted him. If you got permabanned, you had to have gotten a 14-day ban before, meaning you’re on thin ice. Even if you call the dude an idiot that’s basically enough for a perma ban in the end

LV49, 10 years old.

Cant have used it that much recently..

Either way you chose to get yourself banned, nobody did it for you. Getting permed takes effort.

You should only congratulate yourself.
Do not agree to terms you cannot follow.

well to be fair you had no reason to help him. he was harassing the shit out of you and he expects you to listen to him cause he is being an ass. if you ever make a new account (won't blame you if you don't) just do what i do. unless someone is nice to you, don't give them any fucks. i've had my share of toxic teammates that expect you to listen to them or they report you. i'm lvl 108 now and i have become near immune to the toxic bullshit my teams give me. also there was no reason to bring the enemy team into the problem. cause why would they care? you not on their team. if the enemy wants me to report someone on their team i simply tell them "not my team not my problem"

Is it really that hard to just mute your harassers and keep doing what you do?

Like I legit feel bad for you getting banned but come on dude . . you could've handled things differently.

NOTICE: Don't down vote a post like his, he's frustrated and his only way of relieving that stress is by opening up to you guys. Like down voting posts like these is even more sad than him being banned. You would've all posted aswell, most of you atleast if you ever got banned.
Topic is already at -2 within minutes of posting it. Hilarious. Bye league. Goodbye forever.

I didn't bother to downvote you.

That said, while your story is a sympathetic one, it remains a story. On these boards, you're one of a sea of players every day trying to represent their permanent bans in a sympathetic light. We have only your version of events to go by in this instance, and you're also addressing a community well-acquainted with the fact that a permanent ban means you've worked your way past several previous tiers to get where you are now. I'm not surprised that the community has reacted negatively to this thread.
You know . . . the boards does have a lot of hate and trolls aswell. Don't let it get to you. xD

I support this guy, because I personally am perma banned and I think that it's actually easy to intentionally get someone banned. Me and my friend provoked a person and then a day later I got a message that he was banned.
